notes.title: Authorsâ€™ contributions
notes.p: KFW and HDS were responsible for the design, protocol drafting, running of the study as well as the guarantors of the paper. CPKS, CR and KA coordinated with the laboratory work and conducted all the PCR and HRV typing tests. CKP, NJCN and NSS involved in the recruiting and assessment of subjects. IA coordinated this study and assessed the subjects, collected data and input them into the database. CTO is our statistician, and he performed all the statistical analyses. All authors involved in the approval of the protocol before the start of the project and all were involved in drafting of this manuscript.
